In the process, racers often drive dangerously close to traffic, barriers, and spectators watching from the roadsides without any protection.افضل لعبة هجولة من ناحية السيارات و الجرافك العالي تحتوي العبة على اغلب سيارات في السعودية و سيتم اضافة سيارات و مابات حسب الطلب في التحديثات،<br>هز الحديد وطوّف وتحدى أصدقاءك! <br><br>أفضل لعبة هجولة وتطعيس وخبات من ناحية السيارات و الاضافات و الجرافيكس، حتوي اللعبة على أغلب سيارات التطعيس في السعودية و سيتم اضافة سيارات و مابات حسب, الطلب في التحديثات.<br><br>حياكم بلعبة ملك الطارات الإصدار الجديد كلياً و تحول لمتسابق سيارات وقد خلال الزحام المروري بسرعة جنونية في هذه اللعبة الجميلة.<br><br>لعبة جديدة للتطعيس مع اجمل الشيلات ،استمتع بالتطعيس في بيئة صحراوية و العديد من السيارات هجوله المميزة مثل: الددسن و الهايلكس و البهبهاني والاكورد وباقي السيارات للترفيع في ساحة وجمهور الهجولة الدول العربية. لعبة هجوله يا سعودي صممت لمحبي الهجولة و التفحيط تطعيس الهجولة الدول العربية مع  امكانية تعديل الوزنيات بشكل كامل ( ترفيع - تهبيط - تزحيف ).<br><br>كنق هجولة تفحيط و تطعيس ملوك العربيات تحتوي علي ارقي التفحيط والتفجير بالسيارات الجنونية، هجول يا مهجول مع خصمك فهناك سيارة للتفحيط معك . تحدى اصدقائك فى الهجولة و التفحيط بسيارتك المفضلة و كن مهجول محترف.<br><br>لعبة هجولها يا سعودي،صممت لمحبي الهجولة و التفحيط. لعبة ملك الهجولة الدول العربية تفحيط : صممت اللعبة على مبدا الدرفت و التفحيط والهجولة.<br><br><br>Hajwalah Drift king is a racing and drifting game where you chose a car, city and start drifting to collect drift points,  The game is designed for the drift and racing lovers, a unique drifting experience in a rush road madness!</div>"	"0.00"	"Racing"	"77"

لمحبي الهجولة والتفحيط ملك تفحيط الهجولة الدول العربية<br>◀ بامكانك اختيار سيارتك وتعديلها بالشكل الذي يناسبك بعد ذالك تبدا الهجولة , ملك سباقات السيارات تحدي هجولة<br>◀ شموخ الهجولة ملك الطارة والتفحيط "" منظمة الهجولة تفحيط و تطعيس Drift "" لعبة هجولة و التطعيس و التفحيط  أكبر ساحة مع جبال خطيره مره . العديد من السيارات المميزه من الكامري و الهايلاكس و الجمس و السيارات شنب عيش اللعبة مع أجمل و أروع الشيلات هجوله درفت دبي شموخ الهجولة<br>◀العديد من السيارات هجوله المميزة والرائعة مثل: الددسن و الهايلكس و البهبهاني والاكورد وباقي السيارات للترفيع في ساحة وجمهور هجولة الدول العربية<br>◀توفر اللعبة "" منظمة الهجولة تفحيط و تطعيس Drift "" اكثر من طراز من السيارات حيث تستطيع القيام بالتسابق DRIFTING في  دولة مختلفة و تدعم اللعب اوفلاين او اونلاين مع اصدقاء من مختلف الاماكن العاب سيارات<br>◀حيت تحتوي اللعبة Hajwalah "" منظمة الهجولة تفحيط و تطعيس Drift "" على اغلب سيارات التطعيس هجولة في السعودية سوناتا، شاص، كروز، النترا، كامري، ددسن، كامارو، لددسن و الهايلكس و البهبهاني ، تشارجر والاكورد ، BMW i8 ،هونداي، كابرس وغيرها الكثير العاب السيارات هجوله تفحيط ،اصنع موتر الهجولة الخاص فيك هجول ضبط امورك مر المحطة وعب بنزين لعبة الهجولة سيتم اضافة سيارات و مابات تحتوي على اونلاين , احدث الشيلات الحماسية العربية و الاكثر طلبا, و شات داخل الاونلاين Dubai<br>◀اجمل السيارات العاب سيارات, العاب اكشن, العاب فلاش, سيارات سباق هجولة Saudi Drift<br>◀هجولة تفحيط Hajwlah و تطعيس الانجراف  ملوك العربيات تحتوي علي ارقي التفحيط والتفجير بالسيارات الجنونية ,تفحيط و تطعيس الانجراف  ودرفت دبي بأجمل العاب  السيارات الانجراف االسيارات<br>◀تلعب تفحط ... نعم تفحط فحط Hal itu dipengaruhi karena tarif bus lumayan terjangkaunya serta kenyamanan dan keamanan yang terjamin daripada kita menggunakan kendaraan pribadi atau sepeda motor. Untuk di Indonesia sendiri, terdapat banyak jenis bus yang beroperasi untuk melayani masyarakat dalam menempuh jarak, baik dekat maupun jauh. Kehebatan tim atau klub Persib tentunya juga karena dukungan para suporter Persib yang biasanya disebut Bobotoh Mania atau Viking. Tim berjuluk Maung Bandung ini tidak hanya memiliki suporter dari kota Bandung saja, akan tetapi juga dari berbagai kota di Indonesia. Karena banyaknya Bobotoh Mania saat mendukung pertandingan Persib, tak jarang setiap ada pertandingan, stadiun Persib selalu dipadati oleh para Bobotoh Mania untuk mendukung tim kesayangan mereka.<br><br>Kesuksesan Persib dalam memenangkan setiap pertandingan juga dari segi lainnya, antara lain karena bus yang mengantarkan tim Persib ini sangat bagus dan nyaman saat ditumpangi, sehingga membuat para pemain Persib bisa rileks saat mengendarai bus ini. "com.PCRA.drivesmartsavefuel.light"	"Drive Smart Save Fuel-Lighter"	"500"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">Drive Smart Save Fuel is a Mobile Game developed for Petroleum Conservation Research Association to facilitate deeper penetration of PCRA Conservation Tips &amp; Messages and side by making you enhance your learning &amp; driving skills.<br><br>This game teaches you how to play smartly in order to save fuel while driving .Your driving and efficiency skills will be judged and given score based on your driving and accordingly leading you to play next levels with high complexity by playing smart.<br><br>Government of India responded to the World Oil crisis in the year 1973 and a step towards it, they have given high importance to conservation and efficient utilization of Petroleum products in India. Ministry of Petroleum &amp; Natural Gas, Govt. of India constituted an action group named “Petroleum Conservation Action Group” in 1976 to take the measures towards conservation and efficient utilization of these scarce products. Subsequently, PCAG was reconstituted as “Petroleum Conservation Research Association (PCRA)” as a registered society under the aegis of Ministry of Petroleum &amp; Natural Gas, Govt. of India on 10th August 1978.<br><br>PCRA, since its inception, is engaged in promoting fuel conservation and its efficient utilization in major sectors of economy namely Agriculture, Transport, Domestic, Industry and Commercial through its various mass awareness activities, field activities, sponsoring R&amp;D projects, etc. It helps the government in proposing policies and strategies for petroleum conservation, aimed at reducing excessive dependence of the country on oil requirement. Over the years, PCRA has enlarged its role in improving productivity in use of various sources of energy, for the purpose of achieving environment protection and sustainable development.<br><br>To achieve its objectives, PCRA has a strong network throughout the country. The Registered Office of PCRA is located in New Delhi. In Addition to this, PCRA has 4 Regional Offices at Metro cities and 16 Sub-Regional Offices in major cities of the country.</div>"	"0.00"	"Racing"	"4"

Perguruan Seni Ilmu Beladiri IKSPI Kera Sakti atau IKS PI Kera Sakti didirikan pada tanggal 15 Januari 1980 di Jalan Merpati No. 45, Kelurahan Nambangan Lor, Kec Mangunharjo, Kodya Madiun. Adapun nama dari perguruan ini semula adalah IKSPI yang artinya adalah Ikatan Keluarga Silat ""Putera Indonesia"" tetapi ketika perguruan mulai berkembang diberi nama tambahan ""Kera Sakti"" dibelakangnya, sebab masyarakat maupun murid murid perguruan lebih mengenal nama jurus perguruan yaitu teknik jurus keranya daripada nama asli perguruan. Untuk itu selanjutnya dalam memudahkan pencarian identitas perguruan sekaligus secara tidak langsung menambah wibawa nama perguruan maka disebutlah IKS PI Kera Sakti.<br><br>Mungkin disini kalian sedang mencari IKSPI Kera Sakti game atau game IKSPI Kera Sakti untuk kalian mainkan di smartphone. Join the revolution and start Drifting TODAY<br><br>Drifting is the act of maneuvering a vehicle through corners at speeds and angles that exceed the vehicle’s grip. A drift is when a driver performs a controlled slide through corners while adhering to the racing line. Drifting involves fast cars, super skilled drivers and hardcore fans. <br><br>It’s a combination of driving skill, style and showmanship. It’s all about loss of the rear wheel traction while keeping the race car in total control. <br><br>Drifting is so popular because it brings all the best aspects of motor sports into one package. Highly skilled drivers control a high powered street car past its limit, sideways at high speed, burning rubber. It can’t get any better! <br>____________________________________ <br><br>HOW TO PLAY <br>Drifting is a very unique Motorsport where points are allocated on 4 main criteria: Speed, Line, Angle and Impact. <br><br>LINE: Drift within pre-designated zones to get extra points. The line is marked by several clipping zones where the driver must get as close as possible while sideways to increase score. <br><br>ANGLE: The more the better. Drift with style and try to get your car as sideways as possible without wiping out to gain more points. <br><br>SPEED: Always try to drift as fast as possible while staying in control. If you hit a wall or get off-track, you will lose your current combo score. If you complete the race quickly, you will gain additional points. <br><br>IMPACT: This is the show factor! It’s about entertaining the crowd and delivering an exciting performance. Make them cheer; everyone enjoys the smell of burning rubber. <br>____________________________________ <br><br>NEXT GENERATION GAMEPLAY <br>Stunning 3D graphics using the multi-touch capabilities of your device to simulate an authentic drifting experience. <br><br>ONLINE GLOBAL LEADERBOARD <br>Challenge your friends by submitting your high scores for each circuit and expose your achievements to the world. <br><br>Play often to increase your overall career score and become the next Drift mania world champion. <br><br>LOADED WITH FEATURES <br>•Cutting edge control system including a variable throttle system and hydraulic handbrake <br>•7 vehicles with unique specs (traction, horsepower, torque etc.) <br>•5 unique race tracks <br>•3 level of difficulties; start at easy and improve your skills while completing the normal and pro mode <br>•3 camera configurations <br>•2 acceleration modes (Pedal &amp; throttle bar) <br>•Steering sensitivity adjustment <br>•Replay system with highlights of your best combos <br>•Soundtrack from Good Fight Music including songs from Conditions (Album: Fluorescent Youth) and I Am Abomination (Album: To Our Forefathers) <br>•Exclusive content including DMCC event intro video and photos <br><br>ABOUT DMCC <br>DMCC is entering its 5th season as the only professional drifting series and sanctioning body in Canada developing over 600 drivers, hosting 10 competitions from Vancouver to Quebec and capturing hundreds of thousands of fans every year. <br>____________________________________ <br><br>SUPPORT: http://en.ratrodstudio.com/support/<br>VISIT US: http://ratrodstudio.com/<br>FOLLOW US: twitter.com/ratrodstudio</div>"	"3.99"	"Racing"	"1172"

2 different points multiplier: ""Drift Combo"" multiplier and ""Proximity"" multiplier.<br>Drift Combo multiplier is increased by 1 whenever points reach a power of 2000 (1000, 2000,4000, 8000 etc.). If you change drift direction, points are added to Total Points Indicator (located in the top left of the screen) and reset. If points reach every multiple of 2000 again, Drift Combo is increased by 1 again. This works only if you keep drifting without too long interruptions between one drift and the other (less than 1 second), otherwise Drift Combo multiplier will be reset to 1.<br>Proximity multiplier is increased when you drift with the back of the car near a wall (less than 1.5 meters) proportionally to closeness. You'll notice this bonus with a slow motion effect and a text showing the multiplier factor.<br>If you hit anything you'll lose your partial points and all multipliers.<br><br><br>PERMISSIONS REQUIRED<br>Location <br>• precise location (GPS and network-based)<br>Used to locate player nationality (shown in the leaderboard).<br><br>Photos/Media/Files<br>• modify or delete the contents of your USB storage<br>• test access to protected storage<br>Used to save player profile data.<br><br>Wi-Fi connection information<br>• view Wi-Fi connections<br>Used to send player scores to leaderboard server.<br><br><br>We will update and improve Real Drift constantly. "com.thebrainsphere.mobile.motorsim"	"MotorSim Drag Racing"	"500000"	"4"	"<div jsname=""sngebd"">MotorSim is a drag racing and performance simulator for cars and motorbikes (please note that this app is not a driving game, as it only does a physical simulation of their performance as the crow flies).<br>  MotorSim allows you to configure a number of vehicle parameters to calculate what the resulting performance will be.   It includes an interactive simulator with speedometer, rpm meter, throttle, brake and gear shift (manual or auto), with procedurally generated engine sound (not by sampling) an a representation of vehicle position over a 1/4 mile road segment. Once a setting has been tested, the user can save a ghost/shadow in order to later compare this setting performance with some other.<br><br>  Configurable vehicle parameters are:<br><br>- Power curve (can be defined point by point).<br>- Torque curve (as power = torque * rpm , defining the power curve automatically defines the torque one).<br>- RPM for gear shifting (used for auto mode).<br>- Max engine RPM (ignition cutoff).<br>- Gears configuration (up to 9 gears).<br>- Resistances (Cx, frontal area and rolling resistance coefficients).<br>- Total vehicle weight (including passengers).<br>- Tyre size.<br>- Shift time.<br>- Transmission efficiency.<br><br><br>  Calculated performance parameters are:<br><br>- Maximum speed.<br>- Acceleration 0-60, 0-100, 0-200, 0-300,... and so on.<br>- ... and any other you can measure by using the interactive simulator.</div>"	"0.00"	"Racing"	"2790"

This game plays in landscape mode  with stereo headset.<br>2. Before playing, you have to check that you have worn the headset properly by pressing the test button to hear left/right sound.<br>3. Click the Play button.<br>4. There are 7 left buttons on the bottom left side of screen and 7 right buttons on the bottom right of screen. You control your car by finger swipes on these buttons. Note that do not hold fingers on these buttons, and you must lift your finger when the control is complete.<br>5. You hear the sound of the car running ahead, distinguish the left or right side and quickly turn your car in appropriated direction.<br>6. The game ends when you hit any vehicle on the road.<br>7. Depending on the distance traveled, you will be awarded gold, silver, bronze or platinum medal.<br><br><b>Driving Guide: </b><br>1. Hold your device in landscape mode with screen up by two hands. Keep your two thumbs ready upper the screen.<br>2. When you hear the car engine sound in left side, swipe your right thumb from left to right over right buttons to turn your car to the right. With the sound on the left, do the same with your left finger. The target is to keep the engine sound of the car in the middle.<br>3. Note just swipe slightly and not too fast, because TalkBack may serve it as TalkBack's swipe gesture.
